title: ARAM Shenanigans
body:
Hi! 
The names Hoaxi and I'm putting together an ARAM club with a few buddies. 
If you're a **casual** ARAM player and would like to play with others for a bit of fun and like a good laugh then we could be the peeps you're looking for. I run a few TS rooms which are mostly active (details will be in MOTD) which also bring some laughs to the table. We also plan on running a Raffle fortnightly/monthly but details are still being determined at this moment. 

Just a few requirements:
-Able to have a good laugh
-Respectful to others (Although much ridiculing/banter is to be had in TS)
-Have a small sense of maturity when it calls for it
-Enjoy ARAM

If you're interested add me and throw me a line on League IGN: Hoaxi

**ARAM Shenanigans**
Leader _Hoaxi La Fox_
